title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin talks about the Rams recent slump and if you can win big in the NFL with "super teams". He believes despite Aaron Rodgers being difficult to deal with sometimes, he's one of a few special players in the NFL who is worth the headache. Before tonight's Cowboys and Saints match up, he explains why Dak Prescott needs to prove he can be an elite QB after receiving a huge contract in the off season. Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to breakdown Jimmy Garoppolo's impact on the 49ers winning 4 out of their last 5 games.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
